flagsdescription.title: 747.sampleflow_r Flags
flagsdescription.header: I don't have ANY idea what flags you may or may not use with this benchmark.
flagsdescription.flag: You can't make reportable runs with this benchmark until this flags file is fixed.
You can't make reportable runs with this benchmark until this flags file is fixed.
Use of this flag indicates that the compiler lacks support for C++17 Special Math Functions, and will cause those to be substituted with the versions supplied by BOOST.
